attributes.action: End Covid tiers and lockdowns with immediate effect.
attributes.background: Let the Country go back to normal , let it be individual choice if you feel the need to isolate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
